title: Rose Quartz and Polki Diamond Studs - Navaratan Kadiyam Design
features: Classic rosette design inspired by traditional Kadiyam (bangle) motifs. Features a smooth, oval Rose Quartz cabochon at the center, surrounded by a halo of sparkling Polki diamonds in a prong setting. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, lustrous sheen enhancing the brilliance of the gemstones. The Polki diamonds are set in a classic closed setting to showcase their natural beauty.
colors: Polki Diamonds (white/clear with subtle inclusions). A harmonious and feminine color combination.
occasions: or as delicate embellishments for festive occasions. Can be paired with traditional sarees and lehengas for functions like Seemantham (సీమంతం)
Half-Saree Function (Langa Voni Function). Also suitable for modern cocktail parties and formal events.
description: These earrings offer a delightful fusion of traditional and contemporary design. The use of Polki diamonds, a hallmark of South Indian jewelry, adds a touch of heritage. The Rose Quartz promotes love and harmony, making it a meaningful gift. The high-quality craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty. The classic design makes these earrings a versatile addition to any jewelry collection.
